alert.note: Alert for Dixon Entrance to Cape Decision Coastal Area (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued January 09 at 3:16AM AKST until January 09 at 4:00PM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM AKST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Southeast winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 60 mph. * WHERE...Hydaburg * WHEN...Until 4 PM AKST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Power outages are possible. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A gust to 56 mph was already observed at Hydaburg around 3 am this morning. Highest winds are expected in the late morning to midday Sunday.
info.instruction: A high wind warning means a hazardous high wind event is expected or occurring. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Dixon Entrance to Cape Decision Coastal Area
